title: Gained 60 Ping Moving 3 Miles
body: I moved 4 miles and my ping went from 20 to 80. I live 1 state away from the servers and I use the same internet provider. Overwatch is still 20 ping but league wwont switch from 80 ping. Someone Help?

replies.body: You might need to tune up your own local network a bit with the move to make sure you have a strong connection to our game server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up, and feel free to test it in a custom game.  Let me know the results, and we can go from there if the issue persists!
